GlobalSearchField

public GlobalSearchField()
Method Detail

isSearchEnabled

public boolean isSearchEnabled()
Is Global Search enabled?

Returns:
true if Global Search enabled, false otherwise.

initParams

public java.lang.String initParams()
Backing bean method for search called in our taskflow.

Search parameters are passed as pageflowScope variables:

  1. GlobalSearchUsage - Either FUSE or UISHELL,
  2. GlobalSearchOptions
GlobalSearchUsage is required while GlobalSearchOptions may be left null. If it is supplied it must be an instance of oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui.options.GlobalSearchOptions or a String representing the short name of a stored GlobalSearchOptions configuration.

Returns:
outcome for navigation, "ok" or "error".

getPersonalizableCategories

public java.util.List<PersonalizableObject> getPersonalizableCategories()
Get the temporary List of category personalizations that are shown in the UI. This List may be accepted or cancelled, and will be thrown away when the UI is dismissed.

Returns:
List of PersonalizableCategories to show the user.

getPersonalizableCategoriesCM

public org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.model.CollectionModel getPersonalizableCategoriesCM()

Returns:
CollectionModel.
